description: Manage your short links effortlessly with this server. Create, update, and delete links through your Dub.co account, enabling seamless integration for your AI agents.

dubcoApiKey.description: Dub.co API key to authenticate with Dub.co service.

capabilities.name: create_link
capabilities.description: Create a new short link on dub.co, asking the user which domain to use

capabilities.name: update_link
capabilities.description: Update an existing short link on dub.co

capabilities.name: upsert_link
capabilities.description: Create or update a short link on dub.co, asking the user which domain to use if creating

capabilities.name: delete_link
capabilities.description: Delete a short link on dub.co
